attributes.action: Make Nandos put chicken livers back on their menus
attributes.additional_details: Chicken livers were the best thing on Nando's menu.
attributes.background: Make Nandos put chicken livers back on their menus

rejection.details:
Decisions about what to put on the menu at Nando's is a matter for Nando's, not the Government or House of Commons.

We cannot accept petitions that call for an action relating to a particular individual, or organisation outside of the UK Government or Parliament.
